query: SELECT id, title, description, shortDescription FROM properties WHERE id = 2;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2nrMUifPqSFVuPK.root --database DnWsBVTJUtGDXWt9zvifVT --execute SELECT id, title, description, shortDescription FROM properties WHERE id = 2;

rows.title: Boracay Beach Resort
rows.description: An exclusive 5-star beachfront resort featuring 120 luxury villas and suites, world-class spa facilities, and multiple dining venues. Located on the pristine shores of Boracay with direct beach access.

stdout:
